name: Household Hauntings
description:
In Household Hauntings, you play as a young kid who wakes up in the middle of the night to find that his parents have left on a trip and left him with a list of chores to complete before they come back in the morning. As you begin to tackle the chores, you start to hear strange noises and become convinced that there is a monster lurking in the house.

As you go about your chores, you must keep an eye out for the monster, as it will try to kill you at every turn. You must use your wits and quick reflexes to evade the monster and complete your chores before time runs out.

This is my first ever "finished" game!

This game was made during a 1-week game dev challenge:

Watch the video here: TBD

P.S.

The game does contain bugs.
